#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<vector>
#include<memory.h>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<cassert>
using namespace std;

int x, y, xb, yb, n, res;

int abs(int x)
{
    return x>0?x:-x;
}

void solve()
{
res = 0;
scanf("%d", &n);
scanf("%d%d", &xb, &yb);

for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
{
    scanf("%d%d", &x, &y);
    res+= abs(x-xb) + abs(y-yb);
}
printf("%d\n", 2*res);

}

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif

    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
        solve();
    }
}
